title: Clothier Voodoo Doll
info: The Clothier Voodoo Doll is an accessory that allows the player and other NPCs to harm and kill the Clothier NPC. Killing the Clothier at night this way summons Skeletron. The doll has a 0.33% (1/300) chance to drop from Angry Bones or Dark Casters in the Dungeon.
